Dashboard.title: Poets crew
Dashboard.description: With this tool you can generate a poem out of an uploaded image content.

success.title: Account created!
success.message: Please sign in with your credentials

error.title: Login failed
error.message: An error occurred, we cannot log you in at this moment. Please try again after a while

AuthSchema.nameMin: Name must be at least 3 characters
AuthSchema.nameRegex: Only letters and spaces are allowed
AuthSchema.usernameMin: Username must be at least 3 characters
AuthSchema.usernameRegex: Only letters, numbers and underscores are allowed
AuthSchema.passwordMin: Password must be at least 6 characters
AuthSchema.passwordRegex: Password is alphanumeric here with underscore and dashes allowed

User.networkErrorMessage: We are experiencing a network error. Please try again later

error.fileMime: We accept image file of gif, jpeg, png, webp mime types
error.actionErrorMessage: We are experiencing a problem processing your file
error.fileNetworkErrorMessage: We are experiencing a file processing error. Please try again later
error.errorFromAPIMessage: We are resolving the issue, and encourage you to check back later
error.retryExhaustedMessage: We are unable to process your request at this time. Please, try again later

success.title: Processing has been started!
success.message: We are processing your image and get back with a result shortly

file.label: Click to upload or drag and drop

enhance.label: Enhance:
enhance.placeholder: The photo was taken in.., The child name is.., This is a summer 2026..

processing.title: We are processing your file..
processing.message: Please, do not close on navigate away from this page. That should not take long

success.title: Processing has been completed!
success.message: We have successfully generated some nice poems for you
